metadata.title: CVE-2021-25319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the packaging ofvirtualbox of openSUSE Factory allows local attackers in the vboxusersgroupu to escalate to root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory virtualboxversion 6.1.20-1.1 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
